name: The American Dream
description: Look down the barrel of a future where all your everyday needs are solved with guns.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Window 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 (equivalent or better) Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060/AMD Radeon RX 480 (equivalent or better) Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
